venue.address_2: Back in the corner to the right of the carousel
venue.name: Buckland Hills Mall

item.description:
Well we survived our first meeting and decided we all liked each other enough to attempt a second one....same bat time same bat place. We also decided we would just like to hang out again, share and kind of get to know each other a bit better. Join us if you like we are an ecclectic bunch....each creative in our own ways and dare I say we know what we beleive (to paraphrase PhantomWolf).

I had a great time at our first and i look forward to the next one as well.

Blessings

Marion
item.name: M/V Pagan Meetup
